$rag.description: Recessed surface color for inset areas
$rag.accessibility: Provides visual depth while maintaining readable contrast
$rag.brand-impact: Low - neutral surface that adapts to brand

$rag.description: Base application background color
$rag.accessibility: Foundation color that supports all text hierarchy levels
$rag.brand-impact: Low - neutral foundation that adapts to brand

$rag.description: Primary surface color for content areas
$rag.accessibility: Provides sufficient contrast for text content
$rag.brand-impact: Low - neutral surface that adapts to brand
dont: Mix with similar surface levels without hierarchy

$rag.description: Elevated surface color for layered content
$rag.accessibility: Maintains hierarchy while ensuring text readability
$rag.brand-impact: Low - neutral surface that adapts to brand

$rag.description: Highest elevation surface for top-layer content
$rag.accessibility: Highest contrast surface for critical content
$rag.brand-impact: Low - neutral surface that adapts to brand
$rag.semantic-meaning: Maximum elevation surface for critical UI

$rag.description: Semi-transparent overlay background
$rag.accessibility: Provides focus and context separation for overlaid content

$rag.description: Inverted surface color for contrast
$rag.accessibility: Provides maximum contrast with inverse text colors

$rag.description: Primary text color for body content
$rag.accessibility: Ensures WCAG AA compliance with minimum 4.5:1 contrast ratio
$rag.semantic-meaning: Default readable text for all content
dont: Use on dark backgrounds without inverse

$rag.description: Inverted text color for dark backgrounds
$rag.accessibility: Provides sufficient contrast on inverse surfaces

$rag.description: Secondary text color for supporting content
$rag.accessibility: Maintains readable contrast while being visually subdued

$rag.description: Subtle text for dark backgrounds
$rag.accessibility: Provides contrast on dark backgrounds while remaining subtle

$rag.description: Tertiary text color for minimal emphasis
$rag.accessibility: May not meet AA standards - use sparingly for non-critical content
$rag.semantic-meaning: Minimal emphasis text for tertiary content

$rag.description: Interactive text color for links and actions
$rag.accessibility: Underline links for accessibility beyond color alone
$rag.brand-impact: High - core brand expression for interactivity

$rag.description: Text color on hover for interactive elements
$rag.accessibility: Provide additional hover indicators beyond color

$rag.description: Text color when interactive element is pressed
$rag.accessibility: Ensure sufficient contrast in all interaction states

$rag.description: Success state color for positive feedback
$rag.accessibility: Combine with icons and text, not color alone

$rag.description: High-contrast success color for emphasis
$rag.accessibility: Ensures maximum visibility for success indicators

$rag.description: Subtle background for success alerts and notifications
$rag.accessibility: Provides gentle success context while maintaining readability

$rag.description: Error state color for negative feedback
$rag.accessibility: Always combine with error text and icons, never rely on color alone

$rag.description: High-contrast error color for maximum visibility
$rag.accessibility: Ensures error visibility for critical feedback

$rag.description: Subtle background for error alerts and messages
$rag.accessibility: Provides error context while maintaining content readability
$rag.semantic-meaning: Error background for alerts and notifications

$rag.description: Informational state color for neutral feedback
$rag.accessibility: Combine with info icons and clear messaging

$rag.description: High-contrast info color for emphasis
$rag.accessibility: Ensures visibility for informational elements

$rag.description: Subtle background for informational messages
$rag.accessibility: Provides informational context without overwhelming content

$rag.description: Warning state color for cautionary feedback
$rag.accessibility: Always pair with warning icons and descriptive text

$rag.description: High-contrast warning color for visibility
$rag.accessibility: Ensures warning visibility while avoiding alarm

$rag.description: Subtle background for warning alerts
$rag.accessibility: Provides warning context while maintaining readability

$rag.description: High-contrast border for emphasis and separation
$rag.accessibility: Provides clear visual boundaries for interactive elements

$rag.description: Standard border color for general use
$rag.accessibility: Provides subtle definition while maintaining clean aesthetics
dont: Mix randomly with other border colors

$rag.description: Subtle border for minimal separation
$rag.accessibility: May have low contrast - use for non-critical boundaries

$rag.description: Focus indicator border for keyboard navigation
$rag.accessibility: Critical for keyboard navigation - must be clearly visible
$rag.semantic-meaning: Keyboard focus and active state indication

$rag.description: Primary action color for interactive elements
$rag.accessibility: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio against backgrounds and with text
$rag.brand-impact: High - core brand expression and primary interaction color

$rag.description: Action color for hover states
$rag.accessibility: Provide hover feedback but don't rely solely on color - include other visual changes
$rag.semantic-meaning: Hover state feedback for interactive elements

$rag.description: Action color for pressed/active states
$rag.accessibility: Ensure active states are distinguishable from other states

$rag.description: Subtle action color for low-emphasis interactions
$rag.accessibility: May not meet contrast requirements - use for backgrounds, not text
$rag.semantic-meaning: Subtle action background and low-emphasis interactivity

$rag.description: Inverse action color for use on action backgrounds
$rag.accessibility: Must provide sufficient contrast on action color backgrounds
$rag.brand-impact: High - visible on primary brand elements

$rag.description: Inverse action color for hover states on action backgrounds
usage: Hover state labels on action elements
$rag.accessibility: Maintain contrast on hover state backgrounds
$rag.brand-impact: High - interaction feedback on primary elements
$rag.semantic-meaning: Hover state foreground on action backgrounds

$rag.description: Inverse action color for pressed states on action backgrounds
usage: Active state labels on action elements
$rag.accessibility: Ensure contrast on all interaction states
$rag.brand-impact: High - interaction feedback on primary elements
$rag.semantic-meaning: Pressed state foreground on action backgrounds

$rag.description: Subtle inverse action color for secondary content on action backgrounds
$rag.accessibility: May have reduced contrast - use sparingly for non-critical content
$rag.brand-impact: Medium - subtle content on brand elements
